document.full_text: former berkshire hathaway executive david sokol deliberately misled warren buffett when pitching an investment to him, the company's board concluded in a scathing report that may add fuel to a pending sec probe of buffett's one-time heir apparent.
document.title: buffett's berkshire says sokol deceived and broke law
lines_and_colors: former berkshire hathaway executive david sokol deliberately misled warren buffett when pitching an investment to him, the company's board concluded in a scathing report that may add fuel to a pending sec probe of buffett's one-time heir apparent.
